column2: Agreements extended for agricultural  activities.  By the perusal  of the provision of

column1: the Agrarian  Services  Act,  it is  apparently  clear  that  no  limitation  or  prohibition

column2: introdu:ed.  However  the  only  requirement  in  terms  of  the  Agrarian
certificate  has  been  submitted  to the  Magistrate  Court  by  the  Respondent  Bank
and the Learned  Magistrate has  accepted same and  ordered the Appellant  to pay
the monies due to the Respondent.
